name: Safely land on the moon - r/SoloDevelopment game jam submission
name_original: Safely land on the moon - r/SoloDevelopment game jam submission
description:
Safely land on the moon

This game was made for the r/SoloDevelopment minimalism game jam. Made this game within 72-hours. Thanks for playing!

Controls:

move: arrow keys

restart: 'r'

quit: 'esc'
